description.english: Set a 30-day no-contact period (mute; unfollow; archive). How it works: Reduces rumination and emotional spikes. Example: Use phone focus mode and archive chats for one month.""
description.hindi: Set a 30-day no-contact period (mute; unfollow; archive). How it works: Reduces rumination and emotional spikes. Example: Use phone focus mode and archive chats for one month.""
description.marathi: Set a 30-day no-contact period (mute; unfollow; archive). How it works: Reduces rumination and emotional spikes. Example: Use phone focus mode and archive chats for one month.""

description.english: Prepare a kit: soothing playlist; journal; affirmations; crisis contacts. How it works: Ready tools shorten distress cycles. Example: Note """"Call Sam; 10-minute walk; cold water splash"""" on the kit card.""
description.hindi: Prepare a kit: soothing playlist; journal; affirmations; crisis contacts. How it works: Ready tools shorten distress cycles. Example: Note """"Call Sam; 10-minute walk; cold water splash"""" on the kit card.""
description.marathi: Prepare a kit: soothing playlist; journal; affirmations; crisis contacts. How it works: Ready tools shorten distress cycles. Example: Note """"Call Sam; 10-minute walk; cold water splash"""" on the kit card.""

description.english: Schedule a daily 15-minute window to feel and write. How it works: Containment prevents all-day spillover. Example: 8:30 pm: write three feelings and one self-kind action.""
description.hindi: Schedule a daily 15-minute window to feel and write. How it works: Containment prevents all-day spillover. Example: 8:30 pm: write three feelings and one self-kind action.""
description.marathi: Schedule a daily 15-minute window to feel and write. How it works: Containment prevents all-day spillover. Example: 8:30 pm: write three feelings and one self-kind action.""

description.english: Hide photos/mementos; disable memory reminders. How it works: Lowers unexpected cues. Example: Move gifts to a labeled box in a closet; turn off """"On This Day"""" alerts.""
description.hindi: Hide photos/mementos; disable memory reminders. How it works: Lowers unexpected cues. Example: Move gifts to a labeled box in a closet; turn off """"On This Day"""" alerts.""
description.marathi: Hide photos/mementos; disable memory reminders. How it works: Lowers unexpected cues. Example: Move gifts to a labeled box in a closet; turn off """"On This Day"""" alerts.""

description.english: Identify 2–3 people for check-ins; send brief updates. How it works: Connection counters isolation. Example: """"Did my walk; urge to text ex dropped to 3/10.""""""
description.hindi: Identify 2–3 people for check-ins; send brief updates. How it works: Connection counters isolation. Example: """"Did my walk; urge to text ex dropped to 3/10.""""""
description.marathi: Identify 2–3 people for check-ins; send brief updates. How it works: Connection counters isolation. Example: """"Did my walk; urge to text ex dropped to 3/10.""""""

description.english: Keep sleep; meals; movement consistent. How it works: Stabilizes mood and energy. Example: 11 pm lights out; 7 am wake; 20-minute morning stretch.""
description.hindi: Keep sleep; meals; movement consistent. How it works: Stabilizes mood and energy. Example: 11 pm lights out; 7 am wake; 20-minute morning stretch.""
description.marathi: Keep sleep; meals; movement consistent. How it works: Stabilizes mood and energy. Example: 11 pm lights out; 7 am wake; 20-minute morning stretch.""

description.english: Plan absorbing; value-aligned activities. How it works: Competes with rumination. Example: Join a weekend volunteer shift or take a short course.""
description.hindi: Plan absorbing; value-aligned activities. How it works: Competes with rumination. Example: Join a weekend volunteer shift or take a short course.""
description.marathi: Plan absorbing; value-aligned activities. How it works: Competes with rumination. Example: Join a weekend volunteer shift or take a short course.""

description.english: Define your pace and non-negotiables before dating. How it works: Prevents reactive choices. Example: """"No dates for 4 weeks; coffee-only first meetings.""""""
description.hindi: Define your pace and non-negotiables before dating. How it works: Prevents reactive choices. Example: """"No dates for 4 weeks; coffee-only first meetings.""""""
description.marathi: Define your pace and non-negotiables before dating. How it works: Prevents reactive choices. Example: """"No dates for 4 weeks; coffee-only first meetings.""""""

description.english: Write a balanced breakup story (what I learned; what I want next). How it works: Builds agency and clarity. Example: """"I value consistency; I will ask earlier for what I need.""""""
description.hindi: Write a balanced breakup story (what I learned; what I want next). How it works: Builds agency and clarity. Example: """"I value consistency; I will ask earlier for what I need.""""""
description.marathi: Write a balanced breakup story (what I learned; what I want next). How it works: Builds agency and clarity. Example: """"I value consistency; I will ask earlier for what I need.""""""

description.english: Why it helps: Quickly lowers arousal to reduce impulsive texting or rebound urges. What to do: Inhale 4s; hold 4s; exhale 4s; hold 4s for 3 minutes. Example: Do before checking your ex’s socials.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Quickly lowers arousal to reduce impulsive texting or rebound urges. What to do: Inhale 4s; hold 4s; exhale 4s; hold 4s for 3 minutes. Example: Do before checking your ex’s socials.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Quickly lowers arousal to reduce impulsive texting or rebound urges. What to do: Inhale 4s; hold 4s; exhale 4s; hold 4s for 3 minutes. Example: Do before checking your ex’s socials.""

description.english: Why it helps: Shifts attention from ruminations to present sensations. What to do: Name 5 see; 4 feel; 3 hear; 2 smell; 1 taste. Example: After seeing an old photo; ground before acting.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Shifts attention from ruminations to present sensations. What to do: Name 5 see; 4 feel; 3 hear; 2 smell; 1 taste. Example: After seeing an old photo; ground before acting.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Shifts attention from ruminations to present sensations. What to do: Name 5 see; 4 feel; 3 hear; 2 smell; 1 taste. Example: After seeing an old photo; ground before acting.""

description.english: Why it helps: Releases tension that amplifies grief and urgency. What to do: Tense 5s/release 10s from feet to face for 8–10 minutes. Example: Use at night when the urge to text is strongest.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Releases tension that amplifies grief and urgency. What to do: Tense 5s/release 10s from feet to face for 8–10 minutes. Example: Use at night when the urge to text is strongest.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Releases tension that amplifies grief and urgency. What to do: Tense 5s/release 10s from feet to face for 8–10 minutes. Example: Use at night when the urge to text is strongest.""

description.english: Why it helps: Activates parasympathetic calm and widens perspective. What to do: Inhale 4s; exhale 6s for 5 minutes. Example: Practice before deciding about dates or messages.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Activates parasympathetic calm and widens perspective. What to do: Inhale 4s; exhale 6s for 5 minutes. Example: Practice before deciding about dates or messages.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Activates parasympathetic calm and widens perspective. What to do: Inhale 4s; exhale 6s for 5 minutes. Example: Practice before deciding about dates or messages.""

description.english: Why it helps: Creates soothing mental space during wave-like emotions. What to do: Visualize a calm harbor with sensory details for 5 minutes. Example: After a trigger song; imagine anchoring safely.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Creates soothing mental space during wave-like emotions. What to do: Visualize a calm harbor with sensory details for 5 minutes. Example: After a trigger song; imagine anchoring safely.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Creates soothing mental space during wave-like emotions. What to do: Visualize a calm harbor with sensory details for 5 minutes. Example: After a trigger song; imagine anchoring safely.""

description.english: Why it helps: Rapidly calms the nervous system during spikes. What to do: Splash face or hold ice 30–60s while slow breathing. Example: When urge ≥7/10 to call your ex.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Rapidly calms the nervous system during spikes. What to do: Splash face or hold ice 30–60s while slow breathing. Example: When urge ≥7/10 to call your ex.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Rapidly calms the nervous system during spikes. What to do: Splash face or hold ice 30–60s while slow breathing. Example: When urge ≥7/10 to call your ex.""

description.english: Why it helps: Softens self-blame that fuels rebound behaviour. What to do: Read a prepared statement slowly. Example: “This pain is temporary; I can choose what supports healing.”""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Softens self-blame that fuels rebound behaviour. What to do: Read a prepared statement slowly. Example: “This pain is temporary; I can choose what supports healing.”""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Softens self-blame that fuels rebound behaviour. What to do: Read a prepared statement slowly. Example: “This pain is temporary; I can choose what supports healing.”""

description.english: Why it helps: Gentle movement reduces stress hormones and rumination. What to do: Walk; match steps to breath; notice 3 details per minute. Example: Evening loop instead of scrolling memories.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Gentle movement reduces stress hormones and rumination. What to do: Walk; match steps to breath; notice 3 details per minute. Example: Evening loop instead of scrolling memories.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Gentle movement reduces stress hormones and rumination. What to do: Walk; match steps to breath; notice 3 details per minute. Example: Evening loop instead of scrolling memories.""

description.english: Why it helps: Stabilizes heart–breath rhythm for steady mood. What to do: Inhale 5s; exhale 5s for 10 minutes. Example: Daily practice to reduce baseline agitation.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Stabilizes heart–breath rhythm for steady mood. What to do: Inhale 5s; exhale 5s for 10 minutes. Example: Daily practice to reduce baseline agitation.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Stabilizes heart–breath rhythm for steady mood. What to do: Inhale 5s; exhale 5s for 10 minutes. Example: Daily practice to reduce baseline agitation.""

description.english: Why it helps: Identifies moments that spike urges to text an ex or rebound. What to do: Track time; place; mood (0–10); urge (0–10); and cue. Example: 11 pm; alone; loneliness 7/10; urge to text ex 8/10 after scrolling photos.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Identifies moments that spike urges to text an ex or rebound. What to do: Track time; place; mood (0–10); urge (0–10); and cue. Example: 11 pm; alone; loneliness 7/10; urge to text ex 8/10 after scrolling photos.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Identifies moments that spike urges to text an ex or rebound. What to do: Track time; place; mood (0–10); urge (0–10); and cue. Example: 11 pm; alone; loneliness 7/10; urge to text ex 8/10 after scrolling photos.""

description.english: Why it helps: Surfaces painful interpretations driving behavior. What to do: Note situation; automatic thought; emotion; urge. Example: """"Saw ex with someone"""" → """"I’m unlovable"""" → despair 8/10; urge to rebound 7/10.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Surfaces painful interpretations driving behavior. What to do: Note situation; automatic thought; emotion; urge. Example: """"Saw ex with someone"""" → """"I’m unlovable"""" → despair 8/10; urge to rebound 7/10.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Surfaces painful interpretations driving behavior. What to do: Note situation; automatic thought; emotion; urge. Example: """"Saw ex with someone"""" → """"I’m unlovable"""" → despair 8/10; urge to rebound 7/10.""

description.english: Why it helps: Replaces distortions with balanced alternatives. What to do: Evidence for/against; alternative view; realistic outlook. Example: """"No one will want me"""" → evidence of past interest; balanced: """"This hurts now; not forever.""""""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Replaces distortions with balanced alternatives. What to do: Evidence for/against; alternative view; realistic outlook. Example: """"No one will want me"""" → evidence of past interest; balanced: """"This hurts now; not forever.""""""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Replaces distortions with balanced alternatives. What to do: Evidence for/against; alternative view; realistic outlook. Example: """"No one will want me"""" → evidence of past interest; balanced: """"This hurts now; not forever.""""""

description.english: Why it helps: Counters withdrawal and rumination. What to do: Schedule one pleasure; one mastery; one connection daily. Example: Jog 15 min; finish proposal section; call a friend.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Counters withdrawal and rumination. What to do: Schedule one pleasure; one mastery; one connection daily. Example: Jog 15 min; finish proposal section; call a friend.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Counters withdrawal and rumination. What to do: Schedule one pleasure; one mastery; one connection daily. Example: Jog 15 min; finish proposal section; call a friend.""

description.english: Why it helps: Reduces triggers and impulsive contact. What to do: Mute/unfollow; archive chats; remove reminders. Example: 30-day no-contact; photos moved to hidden folder; DND after 10 pm.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Reduces triggers and impulsive contact. What to do: Mute/unfollow; archive chats; remove reminders. Example: 30-day no-contact; photos moved to hidden folder; DND after 10 pm.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Reduces triggers and impulsive contact. What to do: Mute/unfollow; archive chats; remove reminders. Example: 30-day no-contact; photos moved to hidden folder; DND after 10 pm.""

description.english: Why it helps: Shows urges rise/fall without acting. What to do: Set 10–20 minute timer; breathe 4-in/6-out; rate urge each minute. Example: Urge to text ex 8→5 by minute 12.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Shows urges rise/fall without acting. What to do: Set 10–20 minute timer; breathe 4-in/6-out; rate urge each minute. Example: Urge to text ex 8→5 by minute 12.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Shows urges rise/fall without acting. What to do: Set 10–20 minute timer; breathe 4-in/6-out; rate urge each minute. Example: Urge to text ex 8→5 by minute 12.""

description.english: Why it helps: Tests beliefs with real data. What to do: Form hypothesis and run a small test. Example: Hypothesis: """"If I don’t rebound; I’ll feel worse""""; Test: 2 weeks focusing on routine; Result: mood improves 3 points.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Tests beliefs with real data. What to do: Form hypothesis and run a small test. Example: Hypothesis: """"If I don’t rebound; I’ll feel worse""""; Test: 2 weeks focusing on routine; Result: mood improves 3 points.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Tests beliefs with real data. What to do: Form hypothesis and run a small test. Example: Hypothesis: """"If I don’t rebound; I’ll feel worse""""; Test: 2 weeks focusing on routine; Result: mood improves 3 points.""

description.english: Why it helps: Turns global distress into actionable steps. What to do: Define problem; brainstorm 3 options; pick one; plan next step. Example: Weekend loneliness → join Saturday class; set coffee with friend.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Turns global distress into actionable steps. What to do: Define problem; brainstorm 3 options; pick one; plan next step. Example: Weekend loneliness → join Saturday class; set coffee with friend.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Turns global distress into actionable steps. What to do: Define problem; brainstorm 3 options; pick one; plan next step. Example: Weekend loneliness → join Saturday class; set coffee with friend.""

description.english: Why it helps: Reduces shame and self-criticism that drive rebounds. What to do: Write 3 statements and place where visible. Example: """"This pain is temporary; I can choose what serves me; I’m worthy of steady love.""""""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Reduces shame and self-criticism that drive rebounds. What to do: Write 3 statements and place where visible. Example: """"This pain is temporary; I can choose what serves me; I’m worthy of steady love.""""""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Reduces shame and self-criticism that drive rebounds. What to do: Write 3 statements and place where visible. Example: """"This pain is temporary; I can choose what serves me; I’m worthy of steady love.""""""

title.english: Map the ABCs of the Breakup
title.hindi: Map the ABCs of the Breakup
title.marathi: Map the ABCs of the Breakup

description.english: Why it helps: Separates event from beliefs that fuel pain and rebound urges. What to do: Write A (event); B (beliefs); C (feelings/behaviors). Example: A: breakup text; B: """"I’ll never be loved""""; C: despair 8/10; urge to rebound.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Separates event from beliefs that fuel pain and rebound urges. What to do: Write A (event); B (beliefs); C (feelings/behaviors). Example: A: breakup text; B: """"I’ll never be loved""""; C: despair 8/10; urge to rebound.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Separates event from beliefs that fuel pain and rebound urges. What to do: Write A (event); B (beliefs); C (feelings/behaviors). Example: A: breakup text; B: """"I’ll never be loved""""; C: despair 8/10; urge to rebound.""

description.english: Why it helps: Shrinks """"always/never"""" thinking that drives panic dating. What to do: Challenge with logic; evidence; and usefulness. Example: """"No one will want me"""" → Evidence: prior healthy interest; usefulness: calms choices.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Shrinks """"always/never"""" thinking that drives panic dating. What to do: Challenge with logic; evidence; and usefulness. Example: """"No one will want me"""" → Evidence: prior healthy interest; usefulness: calms choices.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Shrinks """"always/never"""" thinking that drives panic dating. What to do: Challenge with logic; evidence; and usefulness. Example: """"No one will want me"""" → Evidence: prior healthy interest; usefulness: calms choices.""

description.english: Why it helps: Flexible beliefs reduce urgency to seek quick replacements. What to do: Replace demands with preferences and tolerance. Example: """"I prefer closeness now; but I can tolerate loneliness and build supportive routines.""""""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Flexible beliefs reduce urgency to seek quick replacements. What to do: Replace demands with preferences and tolerance. Example: """"I prefer closeness now; but I can tolerate loneliness and build supportive routines.""""""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Flexible beliefs reduce urgency to seek quick replacements. What to do: Replace demands with preferences and tolerance. Example: """"I prefer closeness now; but I can tolerate loneliness and build supportive routines.""""""

description.english: Why it helps: Cuts shame loops that trigger impulsive rebounds. What to do: Separate worth from relationship status. Example: """"I made mistakes; but I’m not a failure; I can learn and care for myself.""""""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Cuts shame loops that trigger impulsive rebounds. What to do: Separate worth from relationship status. Example: """"I made mistakes; but I’m not a failure; I can learn and care for myself.""""""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Cuts shame loops that trigger impulsive rebounds. What to do: Separate worth from relationship status. Example: """"I made mistakes; but I’m not a failure; I can learn and care for myself.""""""

description.english: Why it helps: Builds capacity to ride urges to text the ex or jump into rebounds. What to do: Practice toleration lines + timed delays. Example: """"It’s awful; not unbearable—10-minute delay + paced breathing.""""""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Builds capacity to ride urges to text the ex or jump into rebounds. What to do: Practice toleration lines + timed delays. Example: """"It’s awful; not unbearable—10-minute delay + paced breathing.""""""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Builds capacity to ride urges to text the ex or jump into rebounds. What to do: Practice toleration lines + timed delays. Example: """"It’s awful; not unbearable—10-minute delay + paced breathing.""""""

description.english: Why it helps: Counters tunnel vision for quick relief. What to do: Two columns: immediate relief vs long-term costs/values. Example: Rebound date = brief distraction; cost = confusion; slower healing; value = intentional recovery.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Counters tunnel vision for quick relief. What to do: Two columns: immediate relief vs long-term costs/values. Example: Rebound date = brief distraction; cost = confusion; slower healing; value = intentional recovery.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Counters tunnel vision for quick relief. What to do: Two columns: immediate relief vs long-term costs/values. Example: Rebound date = brief distraction; cost = confusion; slower healing; value = intentional recovery.""

description.english: Why it helps: Replaces global self-downing with balanced facts. What to do: List 3 pieces of evidence for capability/support. Example: """"I handled finals under stress; friends checked on me—I'm not alone or incapable.""""""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Replaces global self-downing with balanced facts. What to do: List 3 pieces of evidence for capability/support. Example: """"I handled finals under stress; friends checked on me—I'm not alone or incapable.""""""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Replaces global self-downing with balanced facts. What to do: List 3 pieces of evidence for capability/support. Example: """"I handled finals under stress; friends checked on me—I'm not alone or incapable.""""""

description.english: Why it helps: Automates healthy responses when urges spike. What to do: IF-THEN plan for triggers. Example: """"If it’s past 10 pm and I want to text my ex; then I message my accountability buddy and start a 5-minute grounding.""""""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Automates healthy responses when urges spike. What to do: IF-THEN plan for triggers. Example: """"If it’s past 10 pm and I want to text my ex; then I message my accountability buddy and start a 5-minute grounding.""""""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Automates healthy responses when urges spike. What to do: IF-THEN plan for triggers. Example: """"If it’s past 10 pm and I want to text my ex; then I message my accountability buddy and start a 5-minute grounding.""""""

description.english: Why it helps: Turns insight into skill growth for future relationships. What to do: Log A-B-C; then D (dispute) and E (effective action/learning). Example: A: seeing photos; B: """"I was never enough""""; D: dispute; E: value-based self-care.""
description.hindi: Why it helps: Turns insight into skill growth for future relationships. What to do: Log A-B-C; then D (dispute) and E (effective action/learning). Example: A: seeing photos; B: """"I was never enough""""; D: dispute; E: value-based self-care.""
description.marathi: Why it helps: Turns insight into skill growth for future relationships. What to do: Log A-B-C; then D (dispute) and E (effective action/learning). Example: A: seeing photos; B: """"I was never enough""""; D: dispute; E: value-based self-care.""
